# kimtoma.com

> Personal blog and portfolio of Kyungsoo Kim (김경수), a Service Planner & Product Designer based in South Korea.

## About

- Name: Kim Kyungsoo (김경수)
- Role: Service Planner, UX/Product Designer
- Current: KT R&D - AI Agent Service Planning
- Experience: 15+ years in digital product design
- Location: Pangyo, South Korea

## Featured Projects

- PAIGE: AI-powered KBO baseball app (iF Design Award 2021)
- The Hunters: Blockchain-based reward game (iF Design Award 2020)

## Topics

- UX/UI Design
- Service Planning
- AI & Technology Trends
- Product Management

- Website: https://kimtoma.com

## Technical

- Built with Jekyll 4.1
- Theme: Poole (Dark/Light mode)
- Hosted on GitHub Pages
